SPHRS1.title: SPHRS1
SPHRS1.description: $(document).ready(function() {$('input[type="text"].mrEdit').before('Hours: ');});How many hours did your {response to _spfill1} work last week, at all jobs? End If If SPWRKSTA = {not_at_work} Then

SPHRS2.title: SPHRS2
SPHRS2.description: $(document).ready(function() {$('input[type="text"].mrEdit').before('Hours: ');});How many hours a week does your {response to _spfill1} usually work, at all jobs? End If If SPWRKSTA.ContainsAny({retired,in_school,keeping_house,other_specify}) Then
